import React from 'react' import { Button, Header, Icon, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' function AddTodoModal() { const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false) return ( Show Modal} onClose={() => setOpen(false)} onOpen={() => setOpen(true)} >

) } export default AddTodoModal
